s.text: What "Bush understands," Will suggests, is that "the wise leader should strive to have intellectuals on tap and not be one himself."
In particular, Will asked Jackson, "As president, would you support measures such as the G-7 measures in the Louvre accords?"
In January 1988, when Jesse Jackson appeared on ABC's This Week , George Will asked him a series of questions designed to expose Jackson's deception and ignorance.
